comments.body: I am not sure if its worth noting here, but soak tests that generate a lot of content in a namespace will have a negative impact on other tests that run in parallel given the cost of namespace deletion which until we have better APIs in etcd does a 1x1 DELETE call to a resource for all resources other than Events.
Added some notes to that effect.

comments.body:
I'm not sure if it's worth noting in this doc, but I really wish folks [annotated their assertions](https://onsi.github.io/gomega/#annotating-assertions) more.

An anti-pattern I see all over the place is

``` go
Expect(err).NotTo(HaveOccurred())
```

which by itself tells you almost nothing about what failed.
+1M, I just haven't actually looked into it.
Yes, thanks for catching this omission.  Fixed.
